final_recommendation: Hello! It's great to hear that you're looking to set up a new line with Singtel. Based on your requirements of needing 3 new lines and 2GB of data, I would recommend our Combo 3 plan. This plan offers a good balance of data, talktime, and SMS for multiple lines, catering to your needs for 3 new connections. Feel free to check out more details on our website or get in touch with our customer service team for further assistance.
summary: User is looking to set up a new line with Singtel, needing 3 new lines and 2GB of data. Recommended plan is Combo 3 for a good balance of data, talktime, and SMS for multiple lines. Suggest checking website for more details or contacting customer service for assistance.
